item.title: Download
item.description: The current stable version of Dunst is 1.7.3 released on Dec 8 2021. Downloads Source tarball Code repository (Github) Release Notes for v1.7.0 This release was long overdue. There have been a lot of changes in the mean time. For a full list of changes, see the changelog. For users: The wayland support of v1.6.0 was already pretty good, but this release added fullscreen detection and improved the stability.

item.title: Documentation
item.description: dunst - configuration file NAME DESCRIPTION Global section Urgency sections DUNSTCTL HISTORY WAYLAND RULES SCRIPTING COLORS NOTIFY-SEND ACTIONS TIME FORMAT MISCELLANEOUS AUTHORS REPORTING BUGS COPYRIGHT SEE ALSO NAME dunst - configuration file DESCRIPTION The configuration is divided into sections in an ini-like format. Every section start with the section's name in square brackets. After that is a list of key-value pairs that specify the settings.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Common problems Errors about missing or failing to open a display Depending on the setup dunst was unable to connect to the X server or the wayland compositor in use. In case of X make sure that X is running and that the DISPLAY environment variable is correctly set. For a wayland based setup the WAYLAND_DISPLAY environment variable needs to be set to a valid value. If dunst should be automatically started by dbus or via the systemd service, it is important to know that both don’t inherit environment variables set by a shell.

Dunst changelog 1.7.3 – 2021-12-08 Added Changed follow is now none again by default. This was the case before v1.7.0 as well. (#990). Fixed dunstctl action is now working again. Segfault in experimental icon lookup when an inherited theme doesn’t exist. icon_position = off not being respected (#996). 1.7.2 – 2021-11-30 Added Experimental recursive icon lookup. This is not enabled by default and can be enabled by setting enable_recursive_icon_lookup=true.
